problem_text_cn: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,AC=6,BC=8,AD是∠BAC的平分线．若P,Q分别是AD和AC上的动点,则PC+PQ的最小值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠ACB = N_0, AC = N_1, BC = N_2, AD is the bisector of ∠BAC. If P and Q are the moving points on AD and AC respectively, then the minimum value of PC + PQ is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,过点C作CM⊥AB交AB于点M,交AD于点P,过点P作PQ⊥AC于点Q,∵AD是∠BAC的平分线．∴PQ=PM,这时PC+PQ有最小值,即CM的长度,∵AC=6,BC=8,∠ACB=90°,∴AB=√{AC^{2}+BC^{2}}=√{6^{2}+8^{2}}=10．∵S~△ABC~=\frac{1}{2}AB•CM=\frac{1}{2}AC•BC,∴CM=\frac{AC\cdotBC}{AB}=\frac{6×8}{10}=\frac{24}{5},即PC+PQ的最小值为\frac{24}{5}．故选:C．
